results.title: None of the above

results.title: Reliable

results.title: Efficient
results.description: You got an “Efficient” score for Current State, which is where many typical organisations find themselves. Not a great result, but the good news is that there are plenty of areas that can be improved, to capitalise on the investment that you've already started to make.

results.title: Responsive
results.description: You got “Responsive” as your rating for Current State. This indicates that you have many of the features that indicate a well functioning payment ecosystem within your organisation. To improve this result, you'll need to tighten up your security, documentation and design processes.

results.title: Agile
results.description: We gave you an “Agile” rating for Current State - well done! Looks like your organisation has embraced many of the aspects of a well functioning payment system. But as you're probably aware, this takes constant, careful effort to keep running smoothly

results.title: Reliable
results.description: Plenty of room for improvement here - we gave you a “Reliable” rating on this. As in, you're still in the race, but if some pretty radical improvements don't happen, you might get left behind. Technology is both the actual technology stack, as well as the people behind it. Focus on improving both.
